resources.string:
You can change the Wallpapers in this application by selecting “Choose Wallpaper”.

The first five Wallpapers are stored in the application. Everyone else will be downloaded from the Internet and stored in a folder (wallpaper _duomob).

This theme is compatible with Launchers: 
ADW Launcher 
Go Launcher EX 
Crazy Home 
Live Home 
Open Home 
Open Home 6 
aHome 
91 Panda Home 
91 Panda Home 2 
 
If using ADW.Launcher, once it is installed and running, press your 
Menu Key -> More -> ADWSettings -> Themes Preferences 
 
If using Crazy Home, once it is installed and running, press your 
Menu Key -> Crazy Menu -> Appearance -> Set Theme

For more detail please visit: www.duomob.com

Theme Beautiful Nature by duomob.
If you like, please make a donation.

Thank you for download!
